Detector.Details: This detector finds extensions of classes that have been marked with the @Final annotation. Classes marked @Final should not have subclasses in production code.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: Found illegal extension of final class
BugPattern.Details: Class {0} may not extend from the class @Final-annotated class {1}. Such extensions are prohibited: an @Final marked class must be treated as a final class in production code.

MessageCollection.BugCode: Found illegal extension of final element
